title: Masterclass AI

title: Masterclass AI
text:
AI Roadmap



Voorbeeld AI Roadmap (“AI Roadmap: What It Is and How to Build One” n.d.)






“AI Roadmap: What It Is and How to Build One.” n.d. Gartner. Accessed January 26, 2025. https://www.gartner.com/en/articles/ai-roadmap.

title: 1  Inleiding
text:
1.1.1 Video: Tech Titans at War: The US-China Innovation Race with Jimmy Goodrich
De podcast bespreekt de dynamiek van de technologische competitie tussen de Verenigde Staten en China, met nadruk op strategische technologieën zoals AI en halfgeleiders. Het benadrukt hoe China evolueert van een “copycat” naar een innovatieve leider, terwijl het grote investeringen doet in fundamenteel onderzoek en technologische ontwikkeling. Daarnaast belicht het de impact van beleidsmaatregelen, zoals exportcontroles, en de verschillen in benadering tussen de VS en China wat betreft industriële strategieën. Ten slotte wordt de rol van samenwerking in wetenschappelijk onderzoek besproken, naast de geopolitieke uitdagingen van concurrentie in opkomende technologieën (“(150) Tech Titans at War: The US-China Innovation Race with Jimmy Goodrich - YouTube” n.d.).



1.1.2 Report: ASPI’s two-decade Critical Technology Tracker
This report, produced by the Australian Strategic Policy Institute (ASPI), presents a significant update to their Critical Technology Tracker. The Tracker, a twenty-one-year dataset (2003-2023) focusing on high-impact research publications across 64 critical technologies, analyses global research leadership and institutional performance. A key finding highlights China’s substantial gains in research leadership over the past two decades, surpassing the US in numerous crucial technology areas, particularly those with defence applications. The report explores long-term trends, assesses the risk of technological monopolies (particularly concerning China’s dominance), and provides detailed analyses of specific technologies, offering insights into both national and institutional capabilities and projections for future research output. Ultimately, the report aims to inform policy and investment decisions by providing empirical data on global technological leadership and its implications(Cave n.d.).




“(150) Tech Titans at War: The US-China Innovation Race with Jimmy Goodrich - YouTube.” n.d. Accessed January 26, 2025. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZbdTcKi2p7w&t=1928s&ab_channel=HooverInstitution.


Cave, Danielle, Stephan Robin. n.d. “ASPI’s Two-Decade Critical Technology Tracker.” Accessed January 26, 2025. https://www.aspi.org.au/report/aspis-two-decade-critical-technology-tracker.


Erixon, Fredrik, and Oscar Guinea. n.d. “If the EU Was a State in the United States: Comparing Economic Growth Between EU and US States,” no. 07.


“EU Competitiveness: Looking Ahead - European Commission.” n.d. Accessed January 26, 2025. https://commission.europa.eu/topics/strengthening-european-competitiveness/eu-competitiveness-looking-ahead_en.


“Largest Tech Companies by Market Cap.” n.d. Accessed January 26, 2025. https://companiesmarketcap.com/gbp/tech/largest-tech-companies-by-market-cap/.
